statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 1 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 11 \\ 7 \\ -5 \\ 26 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -18 \\ -11 \\ 13 \\ -31 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
